tool_description: Provides various types of dummy data for testing and development purposes.

api_list.name: provider
api_list.description: Fetches a specified number of dummy names from the provider entry point.

required_parameters.name: provider
required_parameters.description: The type of data to retrieve, default is 'name'.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The number of dummy names to generate.

api_list.name: overview
api_list.description: Provides an overview of all available entry points and their usage.
